data.message: I tried messaging facebook they wont answer, how do I hide suggested friends in my recent tab, on my old phone, a few weeks ago it started showing up, then there was a thing to click on "hide suggestions" I clicked and they hid, I have a new phone and I have been searching for hours and can't figure out how to hide them, there is no option to click on hide it on my new phone, it's really annoying, I didn't mind so much when it shows up in my news feed but I don't need it where I check my notifications, I would prefer not at all if I have to see it there, please explain how to hide the suggestions

replies.message: Hi Thomas. We apologize for the delay and we’re sorry to hear you feel that way. If there's anything you'd like for us to change, please let us know here: http://bit.ly/2rLZZoV. -Jessica

So you can't tell me how to hide it? On my iPhone I was able to click hide I bought an s7  and I can't find where to hide it? Yet if I use my old phone it doesn't show up, I was not suggesting things I was just trying to figure out how to hide it on my new phone just like my old phone
I'm having the same problem with my Galaxy. Still waiting for a fix...
You notice how they still haven't answered the Question? My message still hasn't been returned either.... for all the money they make off of us you would think there would be a some customer service
What's that mean squiggly name guy?
Does that get rid of it on my phone app?
Facebook come on answer me/us/we the people, inquiring minds want to know.
how to hide my messenger green  alert  in my android phone?
